code: import*as actionTypes from"../actions/actionTypes";import{updateObject}from"../utility";var initialState={showAddChatPopup:false};var openAddChatPopup=function openAddChatPopup(state,action){return updateObject(state,{showAddChatPopup:true});};var closeAddChatPopup=function closeAddChatPopup(state,action){return updateObject(state,{showAddChatPopup:false});};var getChat=function getChat(state,action){return window.location.pathname;};var reducer=function reducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case actionTypes.OPEN_ADD_CHAT_POPUP:return openAddChatPopup(state,action);case actionTypes.CLOSE_ADD_CHAT_POPUP:return closeAddChatPopup(state,action);case actionTypes.GET_CHAT_URL:return getChat(state,action);default:return state;}};export default reducer;
